articles.description: As President Joe Biden takes steps to try to ramp up vaccine production, experts say the biggest boon to his administration's vaccine strategy could simply be good timing.

articles.author: Matias Grez, CNN
articles.title: Liverpool's shock defeat to Burnley ends 68-game unbeaten run at Anfield
articles.description: Liverpool lost its first Premier League home game in almost four years as relegation-threatened Burnley pulled off a stunning upset to end Jurgen Klopp's 68-game unbeaten run at Anfield.

articles.description: The Senate will hold a confirmation vote on Friday for President Joe Biden's defense secretary pick retired Gen. Lloyd Austin.
articles.content:

articles.description: If you are endlessly fascinated by ancient history, Netflix's new movie "The Dig," starring Carey Mulligan and Ralph Fiennes, should pique your interest.

articles.title: Tropical Cyclone Eloise strengthens before imminent Mozambique landfall
articles.description: Tropical Cyclone Eloise is taking advantage of warm ocean waters as it strengthens before making landfall in Mozambique. CNN meteorologist Derek Van Dam has the updates.

articles.title: Australia heatwave expected this weekend
articles.description: A remnant tropical cyclone and a separate high pressure system are setting the stage for oppressive heat this weekend into early next week. CNN meteorologist Derek Van Dam has the updates.

articles.description: A fire in a Washington State town has forced residents to flee the area due to the threat of a potential explosion.

articles.title: The US 'can and should' vaccinate up to 85% of adults by the end of summer, Fauci says
articles.description: Despite challenges with the distribution and administration of Covid-19 vaccines, the US "can and should" vaccinate 70-85% of US adults by the end of summer, infectious disease expert Anthony Fauci said Thursday.

articles.author: Jessie Yeung, CNN
articles.title: Paula Badosa becomes first Australian Open tennis player to reveal positive Covid-19 test
articles.description: Rising tennis star Paula Badosa announced on Thursday that she has tested positive for Covid-19 -- the first known Australian Open player to contract the virus.

articles.author: Mallika Kallingal and Jamiel Lynch, CNN
articles.title: Georgia man charged with scamming nearly $1 million from grocery store
articles.description: A Georgia man was arrested and charged with scamming almost $1 million from a grocery store and using it to buy clothes, guns and cars, police said.

articles.title: How late-night TV reacted to Biden's first full day in office
articles.description: Late-night hosts Jimmy Fallon, Stephen Colbert and Trevor Noah joke about President Joe Biden's first full day in office.

articles.author: Helen Regan, CNN
articles.title: Rescue operation to free miners trapped underground for for nearly 2 weeks could take another 15 days
articles.description: Chinese officials say it could day 15 days to drill through 70 tons of debris to reach miners trapped underground for nearly two weeks after an explosion at a gold mine in eastern China.
